edge: Hubie is a delicatessen worker who lives and works in Salem, Massachusetts.

node_2: police sergeants steve downey and blake
edge: Hubie has annoyed police sergeants Steve Downey and Blake for ages.
Hubie has annoyed Father Dave for ages.
Hubie spends his Halloweens monitoring the city as the official Halloween Helper.
Richie Hartman is a convict and childhood friend of Hubie who has absconded from a local mental institution.
Hubie meets his strange new neighbor Walter Lambert,...
Hubie's job as Halloween Monitor is in Salem, Massachusetts.
Richie Hartman has absconded from a local mental institution.
Hubie investigates strange noises at Walter's home and becomes suspicious of his werewolf transformation.
Downey recruits Hubie as an auxiliary undercover unit after he reports strange noises to the police.
Hubie's old classmates Lester and Mary Hennessey scare him at a Halloween party.
Mary Hennessey falsely reports suspicious activity to Hubie at the Halloween party.
Hubie believes that Walter is turning into a werewolf and chases him into the woods.
Hubie mistakes Buster for Walter in his final form at the haunted house.
Pete Landolfa scares Hubie at the haunted house, but is later revealed to be innocent.
Hubie and Miss Taylor's dog Buster are both inside the house when Hubie tries to chase someone. It is eventually revealed that Buster is actually named Buster and belongs to Miss Taylor.
Pete is kidnapped right in front of Hubie while he is trying to scare someone inside the house.
Sgt. Downey suggests cancelling Halloween to Mayor Benson.
Downey, Benson, and Dave believe that Hubie is the kidnapper and is getting revenge on his bullies.
Hubie goes to the radio station when he thinks someone is calling for him constantly.
The police, Downey's ex-wife Violet Valentine, and others think this person is Violet Valentine.
Hubie's mother kidnaps Pete, Mike, and the Hennesseys as revenge for their actions towards Hubie.
The burner phone used by the caller is found in Hubie's house.
Hubie's mother disappears when the news media, Nick, and Richie arrive at Hubie's house.
Hubie's mother scolds the bullies for their actions towards Hubie.
Hubie was elected as the new mayor of Salem after being married to Violet for a year.
Hubie took in foster kids who dressed up like people they know while trick or treating on Halloween.
Hubie got married to Violet a year ago.
Hubie is the current mayor of Salem.
Hubie's mother disappeared suddenly after using the Frankenstein trick.
appears as Peggy, a haunted house employee trying to raise money for her school.
reprises his role as Hal L., an abusive orderly at Richie and Nick's asylum who previously appeared in Happy Gilmore.
plays Karen, a cat owner in Hubie's neighborhood.
plays Bunny, Aurora's wife with a masculine voice provided by an uncredited actor.
